mapper.select: select *, datediff(EXAM_DATE,sysdate()) DAYS_LEFT from EXAM where EXAM_NAME=#{EXAM_NAME} AND COURSE_ID=#{COURSE_ID} AND EXAM_DATE=#{EXAM_DATE}
select *, datediff(EXAM_DATE,sysdate()) DAYS_LEFT from EXAM where EXAM_ID = #{EXAM_ID}
